title: Our Everything
description: ** Mature content, adult situations and sexual descriptions. This book is a continuance of My Everything and the books should be read in the correct sequence.  Chloe and Ryan’s saga continues as they face the dangers of Chloe’s past and try to move on with their future. After a whirlwind romance Chloe discovers that she is hiding a secret that my irrefutably damage their relationship. Can Chloe and Ryan find their everything together or will they be torn apart?
author: Michelle Jane
